name: Vegan Mujadara
recipeIngredient: 1 cup green lentils (soaked in water 4 to 6 hours, then rinsed and drained)

recipeInstructions.text: Place the oil in a medium pot over high heat. Add the onion and sauté for 1 to 2 minutes, until it’s golden brown. Add all the garlic and sauté for another minute. Then add the salt, cumin, cinnamon and coriander, and sauté for another minute until fragrant. Add the rice and lentils and sauté for another 30 seconds, then add 3 1/2 cups (840 ml) of water. Bringt o a boil, then reduce the heat to low and cook for 17 to 20 minutes. Check with a fork after 17 minutes to see if the rice and lentils are cooked.

In the meantime, in a large frying pan, place the oil over medium heat. Add the onions and sauté for 10 to 15 minutes, stirring often, until they’re caramelized. When the mujadara is cooked, either mix the onions into it or serve them on top.
